response.404: Data you have requsted is Not Found.

responseDescription.200: This will get while request successfully executed.
responseDescription.400: Bad request while some data is missing or invalid.
responseDescription.401: This will occur while refresh token is expired or blacklisted.
responseDescription.404: This will occur while requested data not found.
responseDescription.408: This will occur while requested data has found, but has mismatch with request
responseDescription.409: This will occur while requested data has conflict.
responseDescription.500: This error occur while internal server error.
